events.message: I received the wrong size for the shoes I ordered and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue was classified as a refund request due to a wrong size product delivery, matching refund criteria.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and exchange inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund or exchange for the shoes you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the shoes to verify the size issue for your refund?
Here is my order number 12345678 and attached photo clearly showing the size label is 9, but I ordered 8.
We can process a full refund or send you the correct size at no extra cost. Please let us know your preference.
Thank you! I would prefer to get the correct size shipped to me instead of a refund.
Your exchange order for size 8 has been placed and the wrong size shoes can be returned at your convenience.
Just checking in to ensure you received the correct size shoes and that everything is now satisfactory.
We are closing your case as resolved. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
